scripts.wasm:build: cd wasm && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../public/wasm && sed "s|new URL('portfolio_wasm_bg.wasm', import.meta.url)|/* @vite-ignore */ new URL('portfolio_wasm_bg.wasm', import.meta.url)|" ../public/wasm/portfolio_wasm.js > ../src/scripts/wasm-glue.js
scripts.preview: pnpm wasm:build && astro build && wrangler dev
scripts.deploy: pnpm wasm:build && astro build && wrangler deploy
